Posted By: Maraxas-of-Keld (1/30/2010 9:29:50 AM)

posts.post_content:
Why is this card rated so low?  
She is a 1/2 two-drop who has a [Steelshaper's Gift](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steelshaper's Gift) cip/etb effect, that makes this card already really powerful - compare her to [Elvish Visionary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Visionary), she's not even just a 1/2 cantrip, she can get your equipment of choice! Tutor cards for two mana are awesome, those which provide a creature at the same time are insane!  
But that's still not everything, you can even use her as an [Elvish Piper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Piper) for equipents to put an expensive one on the battlefield with her second ability - possibly the one you just put into your hand with her.  
And still, despite all that she just requires a single white mana - what more could you ask for?  
  
Aside from [Stonehewer Giant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stonehewer Giant), [Steelshaper Apprentice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steelshaper Apprentice) got once more overshadowed, this time by a cheaper alternative.  
  
Oh, and you can of course [flicker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=flicker) her to get more equipments.  
Seriously guys, this card has great p... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

But that's still not everything, you can even use her as an Elvish Piper for equipents to put an expensive one on the battlefield with her second ability - possibly the one you just put into your hand with her.
And still, despite all that she just requires a single white mana - what more could you ask for?

Aside from Stonehewer Giant, Steelshaper Apprentice got once more overshadowed, this time by a cheaper alternative.

Oh, and you can of course flicker her to get more equipments.
